_sText:
RACE_BAJARAMA_v4_2 MADE BY WANNAFUCK Original map for Garry's Mod by Francis115 Tree models by Shiroko
Map info: - 1 lap (Around 3 minutes) - Sun - Light Environment - HDR - 5 Cameras, 1 monitor with buttons - 2 Observation Towers - 4 Pits (For fun :) ) - 15 Checkpoints - 2 Ready Zones - Teleports (recommend noblock) - Details (barrels, trees, barricades, etc...) - Map Overview - FragXL.com Billboards
Changelog 4.1 - Checkpoints beeps could be heard from any point in the map, now it's fixed - Minor adjustments 4.2 - Checkpoints beeps fixed for ever - Added some props - Added Map Overview - Added FragXL.com Billboards
Need suggestions to improve the map _ In order to play this map, you need Rally Race Mod installed in your server. If you want to play this map, you can join FRAGXL.com | Rally RaceMania - 80.172.230.146:27015
